update hai_article set cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_email = #{authorEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_type_code = #{articleTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=BIT}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_type = #{openType,jdbcType=BIT}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, article_images = #{articleImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hai_article set cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_email = #{authorEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_type_code = #{articleTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=BIT}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_type = #{openType,jdbcType=BIT}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, article_images = #{articleImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.article_id, a.cat_id, a.code, a.title, a.author, a.author_email, a.keywords, a.article_type, a.is_open, a.add_time, a.file_url, a.open_type, a.link, a.description, a.store_id, a.article_images, a.video_url, a.goods_id, a.cha_id from hai_article a left join hai_article_cat c on a.cat_id = c.cat_id where a.store_id = #{store_id} and c.code = #{code} order by a.article_id desc limit #{start},#{len}
